creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Mafioso is an online multiplayer Turn-Based Strategy game.

Mafia's Mobster Gangs have taken control of all the cities around the world over the past decade.
Make your own Mafia family, hire the best of the best mobsters and show others who is the boss!


GAME FEATURES:

Compete in 1-on-1 turn-based fights!
Get new heroes!
Build up teams and discover new strategies!
Reach gangster paradise!
Be a godfather of your clan!
Take part in a global war of clans!

Please note that the game currently supports the following languages only: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian
descriptionShort: 💣Compete in real time PvP battles, and take your clan all the way to the top!💰

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Clan War
- Polish language

rated.label: PEGI 12
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Moderate violence, Mild swearing
Users interact, In-game purchases
Learn More

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-New arena: Russia, Red Square
-New hero: Boris the Shark. This gambler is an "all or nothing" kind of hero!

Clan War improvements:
-Donate cards to your clanmates and get coins as a reward!
-Clan leaders can send messages to all members via the news system
-Clan Info and clan user profile improvements
-Clan leaderboard and user interface have been enhanced

-New type of chest: Fortune Chest. You can see the cards inside!
-Balance improvements for Hoodlum Hank, Sneaky Sal, and Lucy Lugwrench

descriptionShort: Compete in real time PvP battles, and take your clan all the way to the top!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hero Boost event! Each season new hero is boosted for free!
Piggy Bank! Win battles and fill up the piggy bank with gems!

New heroes - Vincenzo Ricci, the husband of Fiona Phony, the jealous male hater, and Flashbang Fang, the police officer who infiltrated Mafia to find and destroy the Godfather in revenge of his daughter;
New arena - Paris;
Hero balance improvements;
Many small improvements and bugfixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the Mafia Pass: Blood Bound!

Features:

10x more rewards on Mafia Road!
Free entry to Tournaments: one per Grand Tournament & two per Classic Tournament!
One free entry per Grand Tournament + two per Classic Tournament!
Your next Chest will Auto-open!
A new Daily Reward will activate in the quest section
Give free gifts to Clanmates!
Your username will appear in gold everywhere!

Good luck!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Please welcome new hero - Chen Li ! She is a Silk Road merchant and a favorite of the Godfather – she always gets the biggest orders from him.

She's a loyal servant of the emperor and her biggest ambition is to achieve equilibrium between yin and yang in all natural forces. Chen is always traveling with her panda. She defeats bandits using her hand fan and powers inherited from her ancestors.

User interface improvements;
Bug fixes and other improvements.

title: Mafioso: Mafia & clan wars in Gangster Paradise

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Mafioso is an online multiplayer Turn-Based Strategy game.

Mafia's Mobster Gangs have taken control of all the cities around the world over the past decade.
Make your own Mafia family, hire the best of the best mobsters and show others who is the boss!


GAME FEATURES:

Compete in 1-on-1 turn-based fights!
Get new heroes!
Build up teams and discover new strategies!
Reach gangster paradise!
Be a godfather of your clan!
Take part in a global war of clans!

Please note that the game currently supports the following languages only: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Polish

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the new Mafia Pass season: Joke's On Me!

New Hero: Bella Backstabber! - The pirate captain who loves treason & treasures!

New weekend event: Ultra Quests!
Ultra Quests are secret missions from the Godfather that can grant Mafia members Ultra Rewards!

New hints system!
You now get hints based on your own heroes and situation.

Check out the all-new store design- it's beautiful!

Increased drop chance for new heroes in all safes!

Russian voice-overs!

rated.label: PEGI 12
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Moderate violence, Mild swearing
Users interact, In-game purchases
Learn more

title: Mafioso: Mafia & Clan Wars

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Over the last ten years, the Mafia has taken over almost every criminal city in the world. Make your own criminal clan, hire top mafiosos and show everyone who the true gangster is in mafia city!

Mafioso is a turn-based strategy game in which players battle each other online. Become the boss of your own crime family!

Choose from the strongest fighters for PvP battles online. Make sure you have a good balance of attack and defense. And don't forget about your secondary and support skills. They can play a decisive role in team battle games. Assemble a team and discover new winning strategies.

Mafia games features:

- Turn-based PvP online team battle games between players all over the world
- Become the Godfather of your criminal clan
- 30+ charismatic characters with unique abilities
- Original designs and epic locations
- Fun dialogue and audio
- Сolorful mafia city

Mafioso: Bring new members into your clan!

Come to mafia city and take part in the global clan war!

Join forces with other players from around the world. Unlock all the characters, develop their skills and assemble a fearsome crime family to win the global mafia war.

You are the real boss of the gangsters! Play turn-based strategy games Mafioso now!
_____________________________________
Looking for new turn-based strategy games?

Follow us on Twitter: @Herocraft_rus
Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/herocraft
Join us on Facebook: facebook.com/herocraft.games
descriptionShort: Become a Godfather of tactics in this turn-based PvP online! Mafia's clan wars

- Important Bugfixes

We improved the stability of the game, and we hope you'll have the better experience!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the anniversary event: The Godfather's Cruise
Now Mafioso has a new system to set great events & leagues for all the important occasions!

New Feature: Family Armoire - a place to keep track of your rare items and treasures!

New items: Hero Bust, Bust Fragments, Skin Tokens, Paper Tokens, VIP Pass, Master Keys and Bobby's Dynamites!

New Feature: Exclusive Skin!

New Feature: Limited-time Arenas!

Start the battle to join The Godfather's Cruise NOW!

Slick new look
New Rewards
The bank - converts your extra hats into gold

Lead the family to glory, starting now!

descriptionHtml:
Mafioso is an online multiplayer Turn-Based Strategy game.

Mafia's Mobster Gangs have taken control of all the cities around the world over the past decade.
Make your own Mafia family, hire the best of the best mobsters and show others who is the boss!


GAME FEATURES:

- Compete in 1-on-1 turn-based fights!
- Get new heroes!
- Build up teams and discover new strategies!
- Reach gangster paradise!
- Be a godfather of your clan!
- Take part in a global war of clans!

descriptionShort: Become a Godfather of tactics in this turn-based PvP online! Mafia's clan wars

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Two new heroes have joined: Bonbon, Grandma's aunt, and Bardiya, who once saved the Godfather from death!

- Gameplay clarity has improved with updated ability descriptions and added keywords, each with its unique icon.

- Some heroes have a fresh look, and quality standards have been raised!

- Less frequently used hero abilities have been revamped.

- Improvements in game security, ad rewards, and support for Portuguese have been added, along with visual enhancements.
